meaningMnemonic: Know how 非難 is a criticism? Make it a verb and you have the word <vocabulary>to criticize</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Of course, it will be really helpful to know the word 非難 to start.
